message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.CY, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the security issues and challenges of advanced metering infrastructures, which falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CR). It also focuses on the intelligent management of power-related applications and services based on the data collected from smart meters, which involves system and network control (cs.SY). The paper also mentions key management techniques for safeguarding AMI, which is related to information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CY). Finally, the paper discusses future research directions for KMS in AMI, which involves software engineering (cs.SE).
